subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After going 1 for 1 with a line-drive single in his final start Wednesday, R. A. Dickey had a .255 batting average, which was second among pitchers with at least 50 at-bats.
snippet: After going 1 for 1 with a line-drive single in his final start Wednesday, R. A. Dickey had a .255 batting average, which was second among pitchers with at least 50 at-bats.
